questions.question: Which office skills concepts would be nice for me to adopt before starting my third job?
questions.answer:
If you are looking to enhance your office skills before starting your third job, you may want to focus on improving your communicative competencies. The ability to effectively communicate in the workplace is crucial for professional success. To learn more about how to showcase your communicative skills in your resume, you can check out this article: https://cvapp.de/blog/kommunikative-faehigkeiten

Would you like to know more about specific strategies for improving your communication skills in the office environment?

questions.question: What methods can I use to come up with more effective ideas?
questions.answer:
To generate more effective ideas, you can consider using brainstorming techniques. Brainstorming is a creative method that involves generating a large number of ideas in a short amount of time without criticism. This can help you explore different perspectives and come up with innovative solutions. 

If you want to learn more about effective brainstorming techniques and how to implement them in your idea generation process, you can refer to this resource: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#coursecontentcollapse3

Would you like to delve deeper into specific brainstorming methods to boost your idea generation process?
